simpledb.remote

Class ConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.remote.ConnectionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.sql.Connection, java.sql.Wrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleConnection

    public abstract class ConnectionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Connection
    This class implements all of the methods of the Connection interface, by throwing an exception for each one. Subclasses (such as SimpleConnection) can override those methods that it want to implement.
    Author:
    Edward Sciore

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface java.sql.Connection

        TRANSACTION_NONE, TRANSACTION_READ_COMMITTED, TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED, TRANSACTION_REPEATABLE_READ, TRANSACTION_SERIALIZABLE
